articles.content: Fastrack is kicking off 2021 with the launch of three product offerings under Fastrack Reflex portfolio - the Fastrack Reflex 3.0, the Fastrack Reflex 2C Pay and the Fastrack Reflex Tunes which marks… [+1763 chars]

articles.author: MENAFN
articles.title: India- Samsung Galaxy F62 can now be bought via offline stores | NewsBytes - MENAFN.COM
articles.description:
Samsung's latest mid-range offering, the Galaxy F62, is now available in India via offline retail shops as well. To recall, it was launched last month and was up for grabs only via Flipkart, Reliance Digital, and the company's e-store.

As for the key …
